title: Bad Omen
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Achoo! Achoo! Achoo!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Kasumi, are you okay? You sneezed up a storm.....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin is okay. But my nose is really itchy~...... Achoo!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Did you catch a cold?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin feels fine~ If that’s not the case, then......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Then?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>I know! Someone is spreading rumors about Kasumin!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>......If that’s what you think, Kasumi. It’s not me.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>That sounds like what a liar would say! Someone has to be spreading rumors about Kasumin!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>......Yeah, sure. Since I care about you, wear this.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Ahhh~, this scarf is sooooo warm!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
